FROM Quiz_Sets qs JOIN Categories c ON qs.category_id = c.category_id
q.quiz_id AS quizId, q.question AS question, q.choice1 AS choice1, q.choice2 AS choice2, q.choice3 AS choice3, q.choice4 AS choice4
mapper.select: SELECT set_id, MAX(total_score) AS total_score, -- 각 set_id에 대해 가장 높은 점수 completed_at FROM Quiz_Sets_Results WHERE user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY set_id, completed_at -- set_id별로 그룹화, 완료 날짜도 포함하여 그룹화

SELECT q.quiz_id AS quizId, q.question AS question, q.choice1 AS choice1, q.choice2 AS choice2, q.choice3 AS choice3, q.choice4 AS choice4 FROM Quizzes q WHERE q.category_id = (SELECT category_id FROM Quiz_Sets WHERE set_id = #{set_id})
SELECT quiz_id AS quizId, question, choice1, choice2, choice3, choice4, correct_choice AS correctChoice FROM Quizzes WHERE quiz_id = #{quizId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Quiz_Sets_Results (user_id, set_id, total_score, max_score, completed_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{setId}, #{totalScore}, #{maxScore}, NOW())
INSERT INTO User_Answers (result_id, quiz_id, user_id, user_answer, is_correct) VALUES (#{resultId}, #{quizId}, #{userId}, #{userAnswer}, #{isCorrect})
mapper.select: SELECT points_awarded FROM Point_Rules WHERE activity_name = '퀴즈'

SELECT qsr.result_id AS resultId, qsr.user_id AS userId, qs.set_id AS setId, qs.set_name AS setName, qs.set_img AS setImg, c.category_name AS categoryName, qsr.total_score AS totalScore, qsr.max_score AS maxScore, qsr.completed_at AS completedAt FROM Quiz_Sets_Results qsr JOIN Quiz_Sets qs ON qsr.set_id = qs.set_id JOIN Categories c ON qs.category_id = c.category_id WHERE qsr.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY qsr.completed_at DESC

SELECT ua.quiz_id AS quizId, q.question AS question, q.choice1 AS choice1, q.choice2 AS choice2, q.choice3 AS choice3, q.choice4 AS choice4, ua.user_answer AS selectedChoice, q.correct_choice AS correctChoice, ua.is_correct AS isCorrect FROM User_Answers ua JOIN Quizzes q ON ua.quiz_id = q.quiz_id WHERE ua.result_id = #{resultId} AND ua.user_id = #{userId}
